description: Accounts contain information about billing for services, while coverages contain information about insurance payors, benefits, subscribers, and members. This table contains one row for each account record in your system.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the account record.

columns.name: PNB_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Posted Not Billed rule type category ID for the guarantor account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Error


Warning

columns.name: ALWAYS_SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this account should always be self-pay.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: REFERRAL_SOURCE_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated with the referral source in ACCOUNT.REFERRAL_SOURCE.

columns.name: BILLING_TITLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the title used to address the person associated with the guarantor account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ms.


Mr.


Miss


Mrs.


Dr.


Fr.


Sr.


Rev.


Lord


King


Queen


Prince


Princess


Sheikh


Sheikha

columns.name: HB_NEXT_BAL_NOTIF_DT
columns.description: The date on which the next balance notification will be sent to the guarantor for their HB/SBO balances.

columns.name: HB_NEXT_AUTOPAY_DT
columns.description: The next Auto Pay date for guarantor set up with a payment plan on Auto Pay.

columns.name: PB_NEXT_BAL_NOTIF_DT
columns.description: Stores the date on which the next balance notification will be sent to the guarantor for their PB balances.

columns.name: FAMILY_INCOME
columns.description: The annual family income for this account.

columns.name: CLEAR_FOLLOWUP_FLAG
columns.description: Stores whether the account should be considered for a new follow-up cycle by nightly processing.

columns.name: FOL_UP_LETTER
columns.description: The follow-up letter associated with the account.

columns.name: FOL_UP_TEMPLATE
columns.description: The comma-delimited string of SmartText records associated with the account.

columns.name: FAMILY_SIZE
columns.description: The number of family members associated with the account.

columns.name: OUTSTANDING_ACCT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column specifies if the account is outstanding or not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


OUTSTANDING

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_SECOND_DUE_DT
columns.description: Contains the day of the month that the second bi-monthly payment is due.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_EXP_AMT
columns.description: The expected paid amount of the payment plan. This amount is updated by nightly processing. The amount is incremented by the monthly amount when the closed batch date equals the current due date.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_NEXT_DUE_DT
columns.description: Next due date of the payment plan. The date is updated by nightly processing when the closed batch date is the current due date.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_AUTOPAY_DUE_DT
columns.description: The date when the card will be charged for the auto-pay payment plan.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_AUTOPAY_DAY
columns.description: The day of the month when card will be automatically charged.

columns.name: STMT_HOLD_REASON_TEXT
columns.description: The free text information related to the reason why the account was held in PB statement processing.
